Package net.tp.utils

Class PredicateUtils

java.lang.Object
net.tp.utils.PredicateUtils
public abstract class PredicateUtils extends Object
Utility class for predicate.
Since:
1.7.0

    • requireEnsured

      public static <T> T requireEnsured(Predicate<T> predicate, T value)
      Require that the given value satisfies the given predicate.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the value
      Parameters:
      predicate - the predicate to satisfy
      value - the value to check
      Returns:
      the value if it satisfies the predicate
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the value does not satisfy the predicate
      Since:
      1.7.0
